title: Riot, please make a support champ from Noxus
body: Why isn' there any NOxus support?

replies.body:
Death is the best CC

Old Noxian proverb
Not to mention that a good number of times you can cheese a free Q in lane by hiding in the bush at very start and just wait for them to get close lol
If a champion can not stand on their own, they are not from Noxus.

{{champion:91}} Assassin
{{champion:50}} Battle Mage
{{champion:92}} Skirmisher Fighter
{{champion:8}} Battle Mage
{{champion:55}} Assassin
{{champion:7}} Mage
{{champion:119}} Marksman
{{champion:69}} Battle Mage
{{champion:14}} Vanguard
{{champion:122}} Juggernaut
{{champion:240}} Slayer Fighter

We have All classes in Noxus Expect Warden which means a supporter Tank of Noxus. so yes Noxus definitely needs a warden Champion who plays as a supporter/Peeler
I don't feel like a Warden or Enchanter etc. would fit the Noxian Credo of "Might makes right". Almost all champions on this list are aimed towards damage, opposed to control or buffs/debuffs.
Why don't you make a Noxus support?

I want one from Piltover. .__.
The closest to that is Orianna and she is more of a mid laner.
